sqlMap.select: SELECT B.MemCode AS memCode, A.Name AS name, A.Nickname AS nickname, A.CreditRating AS creditRating, A.Telephone AS telephone, A.MobilePhone AS mobilePhone, A.Gender AS gender, A.BirthYear AS birthYear, A.BirthDay AS birthDay, A.Email AS email, A.BIN_EmployeeID AS employeeId, A.BIN_OrganizationID AS organizationId, CONVERT(varchar(30),A.JoinDate,120) AS joinDate, A.ReferrerID AS referrerId, A.BirthYearGetType AS birthYearGetType, A.BlogId AS blogId, A.MessageId AS messageId, A.IdentityCard AS identityCard, A.MaritalStatus AS maritalStatus, A.Active AS active, A.IsReceiveMsg AS isReceiveMsg, A.Profession AS profession, A.ConnectTime AS connectTime, A.MemType AS memType, A.Memo1 AS memo1, A.Memo2 AS memo2, A.MemberPassword AS memberPassword, C.InitTotalAmount AS initTotalAmount, A.ChannelCode AS channelCode FROM Members.BIN_MemberInfo A LEFT JOIN Members.BIN_MemCardInfo B ON A.BIN_MemberInfoID = B.BIN_MemberInfoID AND B.validFlag = '1' AND B.CardValidFlag = '1' LEFT JOIN Members.BIN_MemberExtInfo C ON A.BIN_MemberInfoID = C.BIN_MemberInfoID WHERE A.BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId#

SELECT B.StandardProvince AS provinceId, B.StandardCity AS cityId, B.StandardCounty AS countyId, B.AddressLine1 AS address, B.ZipCode AS zipCode FROM Members.BIN_MemberAddress A LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_AddressInfo B ON A.BIN_AddressInfoID = B.BIN_AddressInfoID WHERE A.BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND A.ValidFlag = '1'
